course_title: Applied Data Science & Decision Support Capstone II
class_notes:
(S/U Only)


Permission Only - Program Approval to Take Courses Required


All EMPH courses are online and asynchronous with the exception of online synchronous sessions on opening weekend (5/21-5/23) and Closing Day (8/6).
course_description: n this capstone course, students work individually to apply the concepts and skills learned throughout the APHI curriculum to an applied data science topic.
prerequisites: PRS 500D and APHI 580D and APHI 585D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
